issues.description: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm is declared as extern rather than exported as global, whereas the template declares it as global. This mismatch will prevent linking and confuse students about the correct linkage.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm replace `extern fix_vec_sub_asm` with `global fix_vec_sub_asm` to match the template and ensure the symbol is exported correctly.
